author: SuperCarlinBrothers
description:
Quidditch isn’t just a game — it’s one of Harry’s greatest joys, and for Ron, one of his biggest dreams. But here’s the twist: what if Ron Weasley didn’t make the Gryffindor Quidditch team thanks to Harry or Hermione… but because of Fred and George?!
In today’s theory, we dive deep into the Weasley twins’ mischievous genius, a suspicious bowl of doxy eggs, and how their subtle sabotage may have kept Cormac McLaggen off the pitch — opening the door for Ron to finally become Gryffindor’s Keeper.

#HarryPotter #SuperCarlinBrother #WizardingWorld 

Written by :: J & Ben Carlin
Edited by :: Ethan Edghill

title: Fred & George SECRETLY Got Ron on the Team?! | Harry Potter Theory
